title: Introduction to Linear Regression in R
text:
Preface
This notebook provides an introduction (or refresher) to linear regression, a fundamental tool for modeling relationships between variables. Weâ€™ll explore the concepts, fit models in R, interpret results, and visualize fits.
By the end, you should be able to:

Understand the linear regression model and its assumptions.
Fit and interpret simple and multiple regression models in R.
Diagnose model fit using residual plots and summary statistics.
Use model output to make predictions and assess uncertainty.
